#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
typedef unsigned long long int s;
s test,a,b,gcd;
s Gcd(s a,s b)
{
	if(b==0)
	return a;
	else
	Gcd(b,a%b);
}
s ans(s a,s b)
{
	if(b==1)
	return 0;
	gcd=Gcd(a,b);
	if(gcd==1)
	return 1;	
	return ans(a,b/gcd);
}
int main()
{
	
	cin>>test;
	while(test--)
	{
		cin>>a>>b;
		if(!ans(a,b))
		cout<<"Yes\n";
		else
		cout<<"No\n";
	}
	return 0;
}
